ranges.message: I'm ready... please, I've been thinking about this all day. Don't make me wait any longer.
Oh... yes, I can feel it starting. *breathes deeply* This is exactly what I needed.
Mmm, that's so good... I love how this feels. Please keep going, I can take more.
God, yes... *moans softly* My belly is getting so tight. It feels incredible. More, please...
Thank you... thank you so much. *pants* I'm getting so full and it feels amazing. I love this.
Oh god... *groans with pleasure* Look how big I'm getting! I never want this to stop.
Yes, yes, yes! *arches back* So full... so tight... I can barely breathe but I don't care. Keep going!
I'm yours... completely yours. *whimpers happily* Fill me more. I want to see how big I can get.
So... much... pressure... *eyes roll back* But I love it. I LOVE it. Please don't stop. I can take whatever you give me.
I'm... I'm at my limit... *trembling with pleasure* This is everything I've ever wanted. Thank you... thank you...
